27#include <sys/cdefs.h>
28__KERNEL_RCSID(0, "$NetBSD: nouveau_nvkm_subdev_bus_gf100.c,v 1.2 2018/08/27 04:58:33 riastradh Exp $");
29
30#include "priv.h"
31
32static void
33gf100_bus_intr(struct nvkm_bus *bus)
34{
35 struct nvkm_subdev *subdev = &bus->subdev;
36 struct nvkm_device *device = subdev->device;
37 u32 stat = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x001100) & nvkm_rd32(device, 0x001140);
38
39 if (stat & 0x0000000e) {
40 u32 addr = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x009084);
41 u32 data = nvkm_rd32(device, 0x009088);
42
43 nvkm_error(subdev,
44 "MMIO %s of %08x FAULT at %06x [ %s%s%s]\n",
45 (addr & 0x00000002) ? "write" : "read", data,
46 (addr & 0x00fffffc),
47 (stat & 0x00000002) ? "!ENGINE " : "",
48 (stat & 0x00000004) ? "IBUS " : "",
49 (stat & 0x00000008) ? "TIMEOUT " : "");
50
51 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x009084, 0x00000000);
52 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x001100, (stat & 0x0000000e));
53 stat &= ~0x0000000e;
54 }
55
56 if (stat) {
57 nvkm_error(subdev, "intr %08x\n", stat);
58 nvkm_mask(device, 0x001140, stat, 0x00000000);
59 }
60}
61
62static void
63gf100_bus_init(struct nvkm_bus *bus)
64{
65 struct nvkm_device *device = bus->subdev.device;
66 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x001100, 0xffffffff);
67 nvkm_wr32(device, 0x001140, 0x0000000e);
68}
69
70static const struct nvkm_bus_func
71gf100_bus = {
72 .init = gf100_bus_init,
73 .intr = gf100_bus_intr,
74};
75
76int
77gf100_bus_new(struct nvkm_device *device, int index, struct nvkm_bus **pbus)
78{
79 return nvkm_bus_new_(&gf100_bus, device, index, pbus);
80}
